scripts.start: sam local invoke --profile shopint --region us-east-1 -e event.json getIp3
scripts.package: sam package --template-file template.yaml --profile shopint --s3-bucket shopint-functions-us-east-1 --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --profile shopint --region us-east-1 --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name getIp3 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.publish: npm run package && npm run deploy
